properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 11 at 11:18AM PST until January 13 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton OR
properties.description:
...Moderate to heavy snow will continue through the weekend...

.A winter storm will bring a prolonged period of moderate to
heavy snow over the mountains through this weekend. Significant
accumulations expected for the Cascades and Blue Mountains.

* WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional accumulations of 5 to 10 inches.
Much heavier snow for the Wallowa mountains.

* WHERE...Wallowa County.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow
could significantly reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Although there may be breaks in
precipitation from time to time, this will be a prolonged period
of snow.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST MONDAY
